response.message: Really well done this week, everybody. That was the best SE podcast I can remember, I think.  I was a serious "Well actually" type as a child, probably still am, and I see it budding in my young children.  Now that I know it's a thing, something must be done.
I came to say this was one of your very best podcasts but M beat me to it. Great job all.
Hope S/O does a Windows Phone app

Is there a feedburner rss feed for the podcast?
I tried google but all i got were questions on stack overflow
good well details thankx for sharing it helful alot
